title: Hurzeler hoping to improve dressing room morale ahead of Villa test
description: Brighton boss Fabian Hurzeler said that there was a “disappointing” atmosphere in the dressing room following the Seagulls’ goalless draw against Brentford. Brighton were unable to make their chances count on Friday, registering an expected goals (xG) total of 1.31 from their 24 shots, though only seven of which were on target. The stalemate saw […] The post Hurzeler hoping to improve dressing room morale ahead of Villa test appeared first on Soccer News.

title: Arsenal winger Saka vows to ´come back stronger´ after surgery
description: Arsenal winger Bukayo Saka has vowed to come back stronger after undergoing surgery that will rule him out for around two months. The 23-year-old sustained a hamstring injury during Arsenal’s 5-1 win against Crystal Palace in the Premier League on 21 December. “The majority see obstacles, but few see the opportunities,” Saka posted on Instagram […] The post Arsenal winger Saka vows to ´come back stronger´ after surgery appeared first on Soccer News.
